about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: Passionate Full Stack Web Developer with a strong focus on creating seamless user experiences and building robust, scalable backend systems. I thrive on transforming ideas into interactive, high-performing web applications that are both functional and enjoyable to use.

cod_network.title: Cod Network, Agadir, Morocco
cod_network.description: I specialize in Laravel and JavaScript frontend frameworks, including Vue.js and React. My expertise includes backend optimization, API development, and authentication using Laravel Passport. On the frontend, I craft dynamic user experiences with Tailwind CSS, Material-UI, and Redux. I have hands-on experience in e-commerce platforms, ensuring high performance, scalability, and a seamless user experience.

agriwise.title: Agriwise, Agadir, Morocco
agriwise.description: During my internship at Agriwise, I focused on frontend development using Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, and Element Plus to build dynamic and responsive user interfaces. I collaborated in an agriculture management platform project, gaining hands-on experience in farm management solutions. Additionally, I worked with Laravel for backend tasks. This experience also enhanced my ability to work in an Agile environment, following Scrum methodologies to improve teamwork and project efficiency

digital_elite.title: Digital Elite, Agadir, Morocco
digital_elite.description: Contributed to React and Node.js projects, adopting Agile methodologies and clean code practices, improving teamwork and communication while delivering maintainable solutions in a professional environment.

coding.name: Coding
coding.description: I love coding and enjoy working on personal projects in my spare time. I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

reading.name: Reading
reading.description: I enjoy reading books, especially in the genres of science fiction and technology. I believe that reading helps me to expand my knowledge and creativity.

gaming.name: Gaming
gaming.description: I enjoy playing video games in my free time. It helps me to relax and unwind after a long day of coding.

exploring.name: Exploring
exploring.description: I love exploring new places and cultures. Traveling helps me to gain new perspectives and ideas that I can apply to my work.

personal_projects.name: Personal Projects
personal_projects.description: I enjoy working on personal projects that allow me to experiment with new technologies and ideas. I believe that personal projects are a great way to learn and grow as a developer.

learning.name: Learning
learning.description: I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills. I enjoy learning about new programming languages, frameworks, and tools.

basketball.name: Basketball
basketball.description: I enjoy playing basketball and watching basketball games. It helps me to stay fit and healthy.

music.name: Music
music.description: I enjoy listening to music, especially in genres such as pop, rock, and electronic. It helps me to relax and unwind.

problem_solving.name: Problem solving
problem_solving.description: Engaging in activities that challenge my logical thinking and creativity, helping me to develop effective solutions for complex problems.

frontend.title: Front-End Development
frontend.description: I am proficient in front-end development using technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I have expertise in frameworks like React and Vue.js.

backend.title: Back-End Development
backend.description: I am proficient in back-end development using technologies like Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I have expertise in building RESTful APIs and working with databases.

database.title: Database Management
database.description: I am proficient in database management using technologies like MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. I have expertise in designing and optimizing database schemas.

version_control.title: Version Control
version_control.description: I am proficient in version control using Git and GitHub. I have experience in collaborating with teams using version control systems.

others.title: Other Skills
others.description: I have experience in other technologies and tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS. I am always looking to learn new skills and improve my knowledge.

high_school.title: High School Diploma
high_school.school: School Hassan II School, Safi, Morocco
high_school.description: I graduated from high school with a focus on science and Physics.

youcode.title: Diploma in Full-Stack Development
youcode.description: I completed a comprehensive program in full-stack development, covering both front-end and back-end technologies.

project_1.title: Task Management App
project_1.description: A task management app that allows users to create, manage, and prioritize tasks.

project_2.title: E-commerce Platform
project_2.description: Laravel backend serves as the core of our e-commerce platform, handling server-side logic, data storage, and providing API endpoints for our React.js frontend. It includes features such as user authentication, product management, and order processing..

project_3.title: Online Restaurant Reservation Application
project_3.description: The proposed online restaurant reservation application aims to address these issues by providing customers with a simple, user-friendly platform to search for and book reservations at their desired restaurants, while also giving restaurants the tools they need to manage reservations more efficiently.

project_4.title: Virtual Gear Hub
project_4.description: Virtual Gear Hub is an innovative e-commerce platform designed to provide gamers with a wide selection of high-quality accessories for virtual reality (VR) gaming. The platform caters to both casual and professional gamers, offering a diverse range of VR gear, including motion controllers, haptic feedback gloves, headsets, tracking systems
